string.text:
A modular attachment system that allows various suppressors to be mounted onto compatible firearms, enhancing versatility and sound suppression capabilities.
 
 %c[pda_white]KIT INCLUDES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Elcan SpecterDR DFOV14-C2 Sight
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Trijicon RMR Sight

A comprehensive upgrade package that includes grips, rails, stocks, and other enhancements to improve weapon ergonomics, control, and overall combat effectiveness.
 
 %c[pda_white]KIT INCLUDES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Elcan SpecterDR DFOV14-C2 Sight
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] Trijicon RMR Sight
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] ANPEQ15 LAM
 
 %c[pda_white]COMPATIBILITY:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[ui_gray_2] SA-58
